Blinken says authoritarian regimes using tech to undermine democracyU.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken said on Monday technology should be employed to sustain democratic values in the face of efforts by authoritarian and repressive regimes to deploy technology to undermine democracy and human rights. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 01:55:55 GMT UDZGBK3MXVJZJC3YQAMWPN3334 https://www.reuters.com/world/blinken-says-authorarian-regimes-using-tech-undermine-democracy-2024-03-18/Reuters世界
Protest erupts in eastern Cuba amid blackouts, food shortagesHundreds in Cuba's second-largest city, Santiago, took to the streets late Sunday in a rare public protest, according to social media and official reports, and Cuban President Miguel Diaz-Canel called for an "atmosphere of tranquility and peace." Mon, 18 Mar 2024 01:45:36 GMT XAVC6ZLLLJNFFOYFOYZMTCQLWQ https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/protest-erupts-eastern-cuba-amid-blackouts-food-shortages-2024-03-18/Reuters世界美洲
Azeri president says peace with Armenia is closer than everAzeri President Ilham Aliyev said on Sunday his country is "closer than ever" to a peace with Armenia, half a year after Azerbaijan recaptured its Karabakh region from its ethnic Armenian majority, prompting a mass exodus of ethnic Armenians. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 00:52:01 GMT TYVCE73IS5LRLBW3QVP5WQI5IE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/azeri-president-says-peace-with-armenia-is-closer-than-ever-2024-03-18/Reuters世界亚太地区
Putin warns the West a Russia-NATO conflict is just one step from World War ThreeRussian President Vladimir Putin warned the West on Monday that a direct conflict between Russia and the U.S.-led NATO military alliance would mean the planet was one step away from World War Three but said hardly anyone wanted such a scenario. Sun, 17 Mar 2024 23:44:49 GMT EKXA2GJCKNPCFCZ6F3TNMXRRRI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/putin-warns-west- Russia-nato-conflict-is-just-one-step-ww3-2024-03-17/Guy Faulconbridge世界欧洲
North Korea fires ballistic missiles as Blinken visits SeoulNorth Korea fired short-range ballistic missiles into the sea on Monday for the first time in two months, as U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken visited Seoul for a conference hosted by President Yoon Suk Yeol on advancing democracy. Sun, 17 Mar 2024 23:12:07 GMT VU2UILXH4NOH7FF65RKK66GHVQ https://www.reuters.com/world/north-korea-fires-ballistic-missile-south-korea-military-says-2024-03-17/Jack Kim世界
Silver lining: Tutoring the elderly is growing fast in ChinaChina's rapidly aging population is fuelling a promising and fast-growing market for companies providing recreational classes and activities for the elderly middle class, from yoga to African drumming and smartphone photography. Sun, 17 Mar 2024 23:06:12 GMT BZBLIQEYSJMJVJLL6YEJNZNDAA https://www.reuters.com/world/china/silver-lined-tutoring-elderly-is-forming-fast-china-2024-03-17/Farah Master, Tingshu Wang, Xiaoyu Yin商业金融
Jordan army detects suspicious aerial movement near Syria borderThe Jordanian army said on Monday its air defence radar system had detected suspicious aerial movements from an unknown source along the border with Syria, which a regional security source said were most probably missiles fired by pro-Iranian militias from Iraq. Sun, 17 Mar 2024 22:24:53 GMT I5FKPHRBAVJH3NN7MJ5BOZXZ6A https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/jordan-army-says-it-Detected-suspicious-aerial-movements-near-syria-border-2024-03-17/Suleiman Al-Khalidi世界非洲
Ukraine says Russia attacks border regions as partial results show Putin reelectionUkraine reported dozens of attacks by Russia near their shared border on Sunday as partial results showed President Vladimir Putin winning reelection by the largest margin since Soviet times. Sun, 17 Mar 2024 22:21:04 GMT 2RP4VEEXQFK6HE4VM7DKBYKMWI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-says- Russia-attacks-border-regions-partial-results-show-putin-reelection-2024-03-17/Reuters世界欧洲
Colombia decree suspends ceasefire with EMC armed group in three areasColombia will suspend its months-long ceasefire with the Estado Mayor Central (ECM) armed group in three provinces on Wednesday, a government decree said on Sunday, citing incidents of violence that broke the ceasefire. Sun, 17 Mar 2024 20:00:53 GMT FZCTJSTL2BPTPDGQVVNADOC54U https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/colombia-suspends-ceasefire-with-emc-armed-group- Three-areas-decree-2024-03-17/Luis Jaime Acosta世界美洲
Moldova dismisses reported drone strike in breakaway enclave as provocationOfficials in Moldova's pro-Russian, separatist Transdniestria enclave said a drone launched from Ukraine's Odesa region blew up a helicopter on military territory on Sunday, local media said, but pro-European Moldova immediately dismissed the report. Sun, 17 Mar 2024 19:19:00 GMT XI53FRIYPJOQJHIDINSKQF25TQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/moldova-dismisses-reported-drone-strike-breakaway-enclave-pro Vocation-2024-03-17/Alexander Tanas世界欧洲
Russians in Latvia vote in presidential election, and some protest against PutinRussian citizens in Latvia cast ballots in their home country's presidential election on Sunday, while opponents of President Vladimir Putin rallied in front of the embassy in Riga in a peaceful "noon against Putin" protest. Sun, 17 Mar 2024 18:55:56 GMT BKXUVXBSPJI4PHRGXDCMK64OUA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russians-latvia-vote-presidential-election-some-protest-against-putin-2024-03-17/Reuters世界欧洲
